executable.title: DSCMRIAnalysis
executable.description: Analysis of Dynamic Susceptibility Contrast (DSC) MRI. Inputs are a multivolume (vector image) where each voxel contains a time series and a label map (binary image) indicating where to define the arterial input function.\n\n
executable.contributor: Xiao Da (MGH), Yangming Ou (MGH), Andriy Fedorov (BWH), Steve Pieper (Isomics), Jayashree Kalpathy-Cramer (MGH)
executable.acknowledgements: This work is part of the National Alliance for Medical Image Computing (NA-MIC), funded by the National Institutes of Health through the NIH Roadmap for Medical Research, and by National Cancer Institute as part of the Quantitative Imaging Network initiative (U01CA154601) and QIICR (U24CA180918).

parameters.label: DSC Parameters
parameters.description: Parameters used for DSC MRI Analysis

float.name: RelaxivityValue
float.description: Contrast agent relaxivity value. Default value corresponds to Gd-DPTA (Magnevist) at 3T.
float.label: Relaxivity Value

float.name: FTolerance
float.description: Tolerance on function value for establishing convergence.
float.label: F Tolerance Value

float.name: GTolerance
float.description: Tolerance on gradient value for establishing convergence.
float.label: G Tolerance Value

float.name: XTolerance
float.description: Tolerance on parameter values for establishing convergence.
float.label: X Tolerance Value

float.name: MaxIter
float.description: Maximum number of iterations in optimizing the parameter estimation at each voxel.
float.label: Maximum number of iterations

float.name: Hematocrit
float.description: Hematocrit value, volume percentage of red blood cells in blood.
float.label: Hematocrit Value

float.name: AUCTimeInterval
float.description: CBV and CBF Time Interval value.
float.label: CBV/CBF Time Interval Value

boolean.name: ComputeFpv
boolean.label: Compute fpv (3-parameter model)
boolean.description: Enable estimation of fractional plasma volume at each voxel.

image.name: ROIMaskFileName
image.label: ROI Mask Image
image.description: (Optional) Mask designating the voxels (non-zero) where the model should be fit. If not specified, the model will be fit to all voxels in the image.

image.name: AIFMaskFileName
image.label: AIF Mask Image
image.description: Mask designating the location of the arterial input function (AIF). AIF can be calculated from a generic population AIF, the input using the aifMask or can be prescribed directly in concentration units using the prescribedAIF option.

measurement.name: PrescribedAIFFileName
measurement.label: Prescribed AIF
measurement.description: Prescribed arterial input function (AIF). AIF can either be calculated from the input using the aifMask option or can be prescribed directly in concentration units using the prescribedAIF option.

image.name: OutputVeFileName
image.label: Output ve image
image.description: Output fractional volume for extracellular space at each voxel.

image.name: OutputFpvFileName
image.label: Output fpv image
image.description: Output fractional plasma volume at each voxel.

image.name: OutputMaxSlopeFileName
image.label: Output maximum slope image
image.description: Output maximum slope in the time series curve of each voxel.

image.name: OutputAUCFileName
image.label: Output RCBV image
image.description: Output Relative Cerebral Blood Volume (rCBV) map.

image.name: OutputCBFFileName
image.label: Output RCBF image
image.description: Output Relative Cerebral Blood Flow (rCBF) map.

string-enumeration.name: BATCalculationMode
string-enumeration.label: BAT Calculation Mode
string-enumeration.description: Determine how to calculate bolus arrival time.

integer.name: ConstantBAT
integer.description: Constant Bolus Arrival Time index(frame number).
integer.label: Constant BAT

image.name: OutputRSquaredFileName
image.label: Output R-squared goodness of fit image
image.description: R-squared goodness of fit of the model to each voxel. Setting this output changes the returned images. When this output is not used, the output parameter volumes only contain the voxels where good fits were obtained. When this output is set, the parameter volumes for every voxel is output and may be masked by the R-squared volume in a separate module.
